scene_description_enriched: The image displays a heraldic crest supported by two lions rampant, set against a decorative background of scrolling foliage in red and gold. The crest features a complex coat of arms divided into four quadrants, surmounted by a royal crown. The lions, depicted in a stylized, almost mythical manner, are adorned with crowns and stand on either side of the central shield. The overall composition is rich in detail and color, suggesting a formal or ceremonial context.
